title: Intentional gameplay tampering
body:
Players are running around like headless chickens every bloody game because they can not get their way, I was called a c*** and a n***** repeatedly while the guy sit 2 walls behind fights and watches the fight. that guy will only receive a chat ban??. every game in the last 2-3 days I have played, my team or the opposing team this crap is happening in a so called ranked playlist. 
The system aint right yo.

replies.body:
For one, racist chat is a real fast way to get escalated punishments.

Gameplay punishments, particularly in cases where intent vs bad decision is harder to determine, can sometimes be slower to issue than chat punishments, but if they are exhibiting problematic behaviour it *will* be noticed.

If he's being toxic in chat as well though, it's rather irrelevant. If it's more than a one-time thing, they're going to be facing hard bans pretty quickly either way.

Game play punishments are harder to dish out, that's the problem people know that a robot is gunna have a hard time determining, so instead of saying something in chat, they are going to take it out thru gameplay. I had 2 people inting I call one of them a f***wit I get penalized, rip another 5 months to become honorable. thats another factor, it takes almost half a year to become honorable. There are tools such as using the honor system to remove people the option to play ranked game modes and a bunch of other options.
Yeah it's real fast.... not like there are flaws at all.
also when people dodge him (because they know what he's like), they take a -3lp loss, and he gets away scot free without any repercussions.
